title: Game Plan
description: Game Plan is designed to provide a user-friendly interface for booking sports facilities with interactive UX/UI
User registration and authentication and separate User and Admin role and user Role Based Actions
Facility booking with available time slots and viewing schedules for facilities with search functionality to filter facilities by name
Managing user profiles and booking history

title: Donation Camps
description: A Charity Website where users can search and donate to various sectors.
A Fully Functional and Responsive for all kinds of devices with customized Authentication with Next Auth and Private Routing enabled.
Separate User and Admin role and user Role Based Actions. Separate dashboard to delete, add any products, review, and order by others and to an make Admin.
Added Pie Chart and bar Chart for Better Data Visualization.

title: Power Vision
description: A web app where user can explore, esll,buy various kinds of sunglasses.
Custom maintain every state changed by user
